Reviews.Title: POOR QUALITY
Reviews.Author: vvbxbxvcbxb
Reviews.Content: Simple this phone is crap. Please don't buy this items it only will save one picture and the internet is hard to get too, its my fault for buying this mess. I guess you pay for what you get take my advice and leave lt alone.....................

Reviews.Title: Too difficult to type on screen
Reviews.Author: Orlando Frick
Reviews.Content: Typing on the screen required an incredible amount of dexterity.  I often ended up typing the wrong word which ended up being very time consuming.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: YB
Reviews.Content: Good phone. For the price, it has everything that one might need on a phone.  Reliable and so far has given me no problem.  Because it has more features than I expected, I have not used them all yet.  So still to be discovered, but so far, happy with it.

Reviews.Title: didn't last very long
Reviews.Author: tamoore
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my daughter 3 weeks ago. At first we couldn't get the phone to work with the SIM card. FINALLY after taking it a cellular store and 5 days of it NOT working we got it to start working. Now after using the phone for 2 weeks, she can't type on the screen.  To me this was a BIG WASTE of money....she hasn't had a chance to even enjoy the phone. I guess that's what I get for buying the phone in the first place

Reviews.Title: very basic,I'm a little disappointed
Reviews.Author: luis
Reviews.Content: very basic cell, works well with both chip, but has serious problems with the most used aspects (I think), you have no predictive text, you can not change or add icons on the screen, 8 screen taps required for to call a number from a missed call, the tech support is very poor, your website way too easy, I can not download games or applications. but for the price I do not think you can wait more .very basic.. please tell me if I'm wrong and tell me how to resolve the questions I mentioned. thanks. e-mail:luis_nuzzolillo@hotmail.com

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: smith orel
Reviews.Content: they were nice and they fast look brand new i would recommend it to another person two sim it the way to go

Reviews.Title: gsm phone
Reviews.Author: ABBEGAIL GORDON
Reviews.Content: my sister  love this phone.she cant believe how fast it is and touch screen.Have to get another one for my uncle.

Reviews.Title: dont like it.
Reviews.Author: Shelia
Reviews.Content: It's not what i expected.it is too small for one,plus it is slow and dull i would not recomend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: attilaromeo
Reviews.Content: I got it on time and i am happy with the product. Thank you,i will reccomend it to other people too

Reviews.Title: Mission phone
Reviews.Author: MR FAITH
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to use on mission trip to Peru in June. They have two major networks there and most people carry two phones. I will gift it to someone when I leave.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.8" QVGA color touch screen ; Quad-band GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz
Supports up to 2 SIM cards, dual standby ; Supports external memory of up to 32GB
1.2 Megapixel back camera with video recorder
Data Transfer: USB or Bluetooth 2.0
Music and video (FM Radio, MP3, MP4, WAV, WMA, etc.) ; Supports WAP Internet browser, texting, emailing, E-book, calculator, calendar, alarm, world clock, and more
ProductInfo.Name: 2.8" Dual SIM Quadband SVP Q70 Black Touch Screen Phone (Unlocked)
